TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Types extends System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem

Docs.summary: Describes data type definitions relevant to exchanged messages. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is a container for data type definitions for the XML Web service. Note especially that this class does not represent a collection of instances of the <xref:System.Type> class, as its name might imply. Instead, it corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<types>` element enclosed by the `<definitions>` root element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
The `Types` class has two read-only properties, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types.Schemas%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types.Extensions%2A>, representing the collections of data type definitions available to an XML Web service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the collection of elements included in the XML Web service. This property is read-only.
Docs.value: A collection of extension elements included in the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> class, this property returns an empty collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of XML schemas included as data type definitions for the XML Web service. This property is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> class, this property returns an empty collection.
